class.name: InputEventScreenTouch
class.brief_description: Input event type for screen touch events. (only available on mobile devices)
class.description: Stores multi-touch press/release information. Supports touch press, touch release and [member index] for multi-touch count and order.

members.member: Touch index in the case of a multi-touch event. One index = one finger.
If [code]true[/code] the touch's state is pressed. If [code]false[/code] the touch's state is released.
